text: aur aise logon kee tauba nahin jo bure kaam kie chale jaate hai, yahaan tak ki jab unamen se kisee kee mrtyu ka samay aa jaata hai to kahane lagata hai, "ab main tauba karata hoon." aur isee prakaar tauba unakee bhee nahin hai, jo marate dam tak inakaar karanevaale hee rahe. aise logon ke lie hamane dukhad yaatana taiyaar kar rakhee hai
